issue.title: [Java] Avro converter should convert attributes and props to FieldType metadata
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7490](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7490). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently in Avro converter, some attributes are used when creating vectors such as “name”, “size” etc, others are discarded.

For named type like Record, Enum and Fixed, they may have attributes like “doc” “aliased” which should keep in metadata for potential further use.

Besides, properties are also not converted properly in some cases.
